# se-table-group

| Slot     | Description                                                                                   |
| -------- | --------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `detail` | The detail / extended section under the row. Can be used to display another sub list under it |
| none     | All the `se-table-item` element                                                               |

<!-- Auto Generated Below -->


## Properties

| Property     | Attribute    | Description                                                                              | Type      | Default |
| ------------ | ------------ | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- | --------- | ------- |
| `selectable` | `selectable` | Indicates whether or not the `se-table-group` is selectable.  Set to `false` by default. | `boolean` | `false` |
| `selected`   | `selected`   | Indicates whether or not the `se-table-group` is selected.  Set to `false` by default.   | `boolean` | `false` |
